org.grails.datastore.mapping.engine
[Java] Class EntityAccess

java.lang.Object
  org.grails.datastore.mapping.engine.EntityAccess

@SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes", "unchecked"})
public class EntityAccess

Class used to access properties of an entity. Also responsible for any conversion from source to target types.

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
Since:
1.0
